import React from'react';import{useParams,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import NodeDetails from'../components/NodeDetails';import CommentsSection from'../components/CommentsSection';import ChildrenList from'../../CodeNode/components/ChildrenList';import ActionButtons from'../../CodeNode/components/ActionButtons';import Breadcrumb from'../../CodeNode/components/Breadcrumb';import TreeVisualization from'../components/TreeVisualization';import DashboardComponent from'../../CodeDashboard/components/DashboardComponent';import useDashboardHover from'../../CodeDashboard/hooks/UseDashboardHover';import{fetchAllNodeData}from'../services/nodeAPI';import'../../CodeCSS/App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NodePage=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const navigate=useNavigate();const[node,setNode]=React.useState(null);const[children,setChildren]=React.useState([]);const[path,setPath]=React.useState([]);const[treeData,setTreeData]=React.useState(null);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=React.useState(true);const{dashboardOpen,handleHoverEnter,handleHoverLeave,handleDashboardEnter,handleDashboardLeave}=useDashboardHover();// Fetch node data
React.useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{setIsLoading(true);try{const{node,children,path,tree}=await fetchAllNodeData(id);setNode(node);setChildren(children);setPath(path);setTreeData(tree);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data:',error);}finally{setIsLoading(false);}};fetchData();},[id]);if(isLoading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loading-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"spinner"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading node details..."})]})});if(!node)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"empty-state",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"empty-icon",children:"\u26A0\uFE0F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Node not found or unavailable"})]})});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"page-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DashboardComponent,{dashboardOpen:dashboardOpen,handleHoverEnter:handleHoverEnter,handleHoverLeave:handleHoverLeave,handleDashboardEnter:handleDashboardEnter,handleDashboardLeave:handleDashboardLeave}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Breadcrumb,{path:path}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"node-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NodeDetails,{node:node}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CommentsSection,{nodeId:id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"root-title",children:"Children"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChildrenList,{children:children}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ActionButtons,{node:node,navigate:navigate,nodeId:id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TreeVisualization,{treeData:treeData,maxDepth:8,path:path})]})]});};export default NodePage;
